about_the_game:
Change set "Nightwicked Night"

The changing set "Nightwicked Night" has the following factors.

1. "Nightwicked Night" costume
2. New initial charm "Celestial Master Yohane"

I will introduce each content.

1. "Nightwicked Night" costume
A new costume that can be a great master is now available!
This costume will be the "Change clothes together" series.
When Yohane changes into "Nightwicked Night Costume", the costumes of the summoned friends also change.
Hanamaru is a maid clothing, Ruby is a small devil, Chika is a costume monster, and it is transformed into each Nightwicked costume!
Let's adventure in the mirror world with a different figure!

2. New initial charm "Celestial Master Yohane"
By changing your clothes to "Celestial Master", the initial charm "Celestial Master Yohane" will be equipped.

* Costume will be added to the closet after purchase.
